title: Deluxe Entertainment Adds to Portfolio of Digital Services at Company's Paris and Sydney Studios
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Deluxe Entertainment Services Group Inc. 
BURBANK, Calif., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Deluxe Entertainment Services Group Inc. (Deluxe), today announced that its Paris and Sydney Studios are expanding their existing offerings and adding localization to meet client needs across the globe: -- Deluxe's Paris facility now offers a full range of digital solutions for local productions and the localization of international content. The studio, which operates five ADR stages, two 7.1 theatrical mixing stages, and a 5.1 mixing stage, completes its media services portfolio with the expansion, giving clients new options for Scripting, Transcription, Subtitling, Closed Captioning, and Audio Description. Additionally, with Deluxe's digital distribution platform, local clients are able to distribute their content globally across all formats, platforms and screens. -- Deluxe Australia extends its localization services including Scripting, Transcription, Dubbing, Subtitling, and Audio Description to clients in production, advertising, corporate and government industries. Deluxe's new localization team recently completed their first project in Sydney: work on seven original series for the launch of Amazon Japan, including the Golden Globe-winning comedy series "Transparent" and the Emmy-winning children's series "Tumble Leaf." 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130313/LA76083LOGO 
Deluxe, Netflix's 2014 Preferred Vendor of the Year, is at the forefront of post production and distribution services worldwide. In a rapidly growing industry where technology increases demand and quicker turnaround, Deluxe's international network enables clients to get the product they want in the time they need, without compromising any part of the supply chain, from asset management to delivery. 
"We are always looking for ways to help our customers reach a broader audience," said Ron Horwitz, Senior Vice President of Worldwide Localization Services at Deluxe. "It remains our ongoing priority to service our clients strategically on a worldwide basis, and we're thrilled to expand our offerings in Paris and Sydney." 
Deluxe continues to reinforce and expand its digital service footprint throughout Europe and Asia-Pacific, linking end-to-end digital solutions across local productions and international platforms. 
About Deluxe Entertainment Services Group Inc. Deluxe Entertainment Services Group Inc. is a global leader in digital media and entertainment services across film, video and online content from capture to consumption. 
Since 1915, Deluxe has been the trusted partner for the world's most successful Hollywood studios, independent film companies, TV networks, exhibitors, advertisers and others, offering best-in-class solutions in production, post production, distribution, asset and workflow management and new digital solution-based technologies. 
With operations in Los Angeles, New York and around the globe, the company employs nearly 7,000 of the most talented, highly honored and recognized artists and industry veterans worldwide. Deluxe is a wholly owned subsidiary of MacAndrews & Forbes Incorporated. For more information visit www.bydeluxe.com
